message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
I'm very interested in the product, but $1200000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I understand that $1200000 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $1100000 for the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $1100000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I really need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to come down to $1050000, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1050000, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $980000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one final offer to try to get closer to my minimum price. I can do $1050000, but I really need to get closer to that. I'm willing to meet you at $990000. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
